title: Efreet
data:
{{version025}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Efreets''' are fiery [[demon]]s which wield [[flaming]] [[scimitar]]s and hurl fireballs with no regard for other monsters. They leave trails of flame [[cloud]]s behind them, making it somewhat difficult to maneuver around them. They can be found in [[the Depths]], [[the Abyss]], [[Pandemonium]], and the [[Hell]]s.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*[[Fire]] resistance helps for reducing the damage you take.
*[[Silence]] has no effect on their spells.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], efreets were [[:Category:Water_vulnerability|vulnerable to water]].
*Prior to [[0.14]], [[bottled efreet]]s were evocable items you could use to create your own permanent, potentially-hostile efreet.
